statements: SELECT * FROM real_time_traffic_data WHERE sensor_id = 123;
SELECT id, timestamp, speed, vehicle_type FROM real_time_traffic_data WHERE speed > 60;
SELECT camera_id, vehicle_type, timestamp FROM real_time_traffic_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-02-01';
SELECT * FROM real_time_traffic_data WHERE vehicle_type = 'Car' AND speed < 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM real_time_traffic_data GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING total_count > 100;
SELECT * FROM real_time_traffic_data WHERE sensor_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, sensor_id, vehicle_type FROM real_time_traffic_data WHERE speed > 50;
SELECT MAX(speed) AS max_speed, MIN(speed) AS min_speed, AVG(speed) AS avg_speed FROM real_time_traffic_data GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT * FROM real_time_traffic_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' AND vehicle_type = 'Car';
SELECT id, vehicle_type, speed FROM real_time_traffic_data WHERE camera_id != 5 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM sensors WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT location, installation_date FROM sensors WHERE location LIKE '%room%';
SELECT * FROM cameras ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT location, status FROM cameras WHERE installation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT location, status FROM sensors WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE location = 'Room A' AND installation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT sensor_id, location, installation_date FROM sensors WHERE installation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01' ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT status, COUNT(*) AS total FROM sensors GROUP BY status HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE status IN ('active', 'inactive') ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM sensors
SELECT location, sensor_type FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cameras
SELECT camera_id, location FROM cameras ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT data_id, timestamp FROM traffic_data WHERE traffic_count > 100
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type='temperature';
SELECT location, sensor_type FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type='humidity' ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type='pressure' AND location='Lab A';
SELECT * FROM cameras WHERE resolution='1080p' ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT cameras.location, traffic_data.timestamp FROM traffic_data RIGHT JOIN cameras ON traffic_data.camera_id = cameras.camera_id;
SELECT * FROM sensors
SELECT sensor_id, location, sensor_type FROM sensors WHERE location='Main Street'
SELECT camera_id, camera_type FROM cameras ORDER BY camera_id DESC
SELECT * FROM traffic_data WHERE date_time >= '2022-01-01' AND traffic_count > 1000
SELECT TRAFFIC_reports.* FROM TRAFFIC_reports JOIN traffic_data ON TRAFFIC_reports.data_id = traffic_data.data_id WHERE traffic_data.sensor_id = 1
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature';
SELECT location, sensor_type FROM sensors WHERE sensor_id = 5;
SELECT camera_id, location FROM cameras ORDER BY camera_id DESC;
SELECT tr.report_id, tr.report_details, td.traffic_count FROM traffic_reports tr INNER JOIN traffic_data td ON tr.data_id = td.data_id WHERE td.traffic_count > 100;

SELECT td.date_time, s.location AS sensor_location, c.location AS camera_location FROM traffic_data td LEFT JOIN sensors s ON td.sensor_id = s.sensor_id LEFT JOIN cameras c ON td.camera_id = c.camera_id;
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT location, status FROM sensors WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM sensors WHERE location LIKE '%highway%';
SELECT * FROM cameras ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT camera_id, resolution FROM cameras WHERE resolution = '4K' ORDER BY camera_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT location, status FROM sensors WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT sensors.sensor_id, count(traffic_data.vehicle_count) as total_count FROM sensors LEFT JOIN traffic_data ON sensors.sensor_id = traffic_data.sensor_id GROUP BY sensors.sensor_id;
SELECT cameras.location, traffic_data.vehicle_count FROM cameras JOIN traffic_data ON cameras.camera_id = traffic_data.camera_id WHERE traffic_data.vehicle_count > 100;

SELECT traffic_events.event_id, traffic_events.event_type, traffic_analytics.analytics_result FROM traffic_events INNER JOIN traffic_analytics ON traffic_events.event_id = traffic_analytics.event_id ORDER BY traffic_events.event_id DESC;
